pattern provided you credit me as the designer if you post your finished items to social media please tag me i would love to see your little fox https //www instagram com/thewoollyscientist https //twitter com/aoife_hardesty let s get started this pattern is written in us terminology if you use uk terminology single_crochet is the equivalent of double_crochet the pattern is worked by crocheting in spiral rounds you may find it helpful to use a stitch marker to mark the first stitch of every round you work i find life is so much easier when i use a stitch marker if you don t have an actual stitch marker you can use almost anything as one once you can fit it through your stitch a scrap of yarn a safety pin or even a hair pin the body head ears and tail are all worked separately and stitched together in stages as you go along i stitched my pieces together using a mattress stitch you could stitch using a whip stitch if you d prefer if you re unsure about how to stitch pieces together check out some online tutorials there is a vast wealth of helpful knowledge out there a note on the colour this sleeping fox is intended to be a red fox species vulpes vulpes i made wizard to be a reddish-brown colour but red foxes don t just come in red tones in the wild you can get animals with increased pigments making them grey/black-toned and also animals with less pigments making them white in tone giving you loads of colour options while making a red fox you could always make yours into an arctic fox and make them completely white or go fantastical and create a bright purple fox what you need 50g yarn in your main colour a small amount of white yarn crochet hook use one a couple of sizes smaller than the recommended size for your yarn my yarn recommended size 4mm i used size 2 5mm black embroidery floss white embroidery floss embroidery needle tapestry needle stuffing scissors abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase work 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease = decrease work 1 single_crochet across two stitches body 1 with main colour make a magic_ring work 6sc into ring and pull closed 6 2 increase in every stitch 12 3 increase in
